com.huotu.huobanplus.sns.repository

接口 ArticleRepository

  • 所有超级接口:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Article,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Article,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<Article>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Article,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Article,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
public interface ArticleRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Article,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<Article>
    Created by slt on 2016/10/9.
